name: Under the Weather (Jhen Mohran)
description:
For the 2022 game off game jam. Theme is "cliche" so I picked the expression "under the weather" as my inspiration. (Hence the title).

Made in pygame with a dash of the genetic alogrithm for the AI

Story?

Um I guess you are on your way back home when a very irritating storm cloud(s)

keep following you. Very similar to the rain god in hitchikers guide to the galaxy.

Am I rambling? Yes. Yes I am

Goal:

Get back home without the car or storm cloud catching you.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move but traffic lights will impede movement.
